story: A long time ago Bran Stark, Lord from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a prophet. Bran Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Tyrion Lannister threatened  the treasure of Bran Stark . Initially Bran Stark was afraid, but with the help of Alerie Tyrell got stronger and learnt military strategy. In Bear Island at the Winter Solstice ,Bran Stark met Eddard Stark and they formed an alliance. Finally in The Eyrie at sunrise , Bran Stark faced Tyrion Lannister . With the help of Eddard Stark and thanks to the learnt power of military strategy , the alliance scared away  Tyrion Lannister . Eventually the peace was safe again. Bran Stark and Eddard Stark went to Moat Cailin and celebrated by watching a play.

story: Margaery Tyrell was Queen consort for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as an influencer. Everything was quiet when one day Bran Stark threatened the peace of Margaery Tyrell. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Joffrey Baratheon, Margaery Tyrell learnt the power of mind controlling. On the way to The Ruby Ford at the first day of Spring, Margaery Tyrell met Willas Tyrell and they immediately became friends. At the Summer Solstice, Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell were almost in Riverlands when they realized Bran Stark was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Margaery Tyrell used mind controlling forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the freedom was not under treat anymore. Margaery Tyrell and Willas Tyrell celebrated in Seagard by playing a game.

story: Bran Stark was Lord for the House Stark and was also known in the whole kingdom as a prophet. Bran Stark was having an happy and peaceful life when Cersei Lannister threatened  the peace of Bran Stark . Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Stannis Baratheon to seek help. Stannis Baratheon was a master of teleportation and taught the hero all its secrets. In Saltpans at Christmas ,Bran Stark met Robb Stark and they formed an alliance. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Robb Stark finally found Cersei Lannister in Torrhen's Square. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to teleportation powers got the better of Cersei Lannister. After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Bran Stark and Robb Stark celebrated in Castle Black by watching a play.
